This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend took this picture sometime in the early evening near the Hudson river in NYC. We had gone for a bike ride to lower manhaten to shoot pictures by the highline. We didnt notice anything until we looked at the picture in the camera. At first I thought it could be dirt on the lens. Then my friend zoomed in and the object was purple when blown up on the screen. Im not sure what it could be so I thought why not submit it...
Summary: Didn't see anything with the naked eye. Only noticed it after we shot a plane.
